mapper.sql: u.id, u.account, u.password, u.user_name, u.is_enable, u.create_time, u.update_time
mapper.insert: insert into zm_sys_user (id, account, password, user_name, is_enable, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into zm_sys_user
id,
account,
password,
user_name,
is_enable,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update zm_sys_user
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_enable = #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
